case.state:
Eh? Paska has grabbed your attention? Wow, she is already popular!
{paska}Squeak squeak!{!reset}
Erm... Hello there, ~player~. My name is Anatoly, and this is my squirrel, Paska.
Poker? Well, taking a break from my studies does sound nice. Don't you think so, Paska?

Hello there, ~player~. I am... uh... Anatoly. So...
{paska}Squeak, squeak!{!reset}
Don't be rude, Paska.

{uk}Привіт ~player.ifMale(пане|пані)~{!reset}-- Er, I mean...
{small}Sorry...{!reset} H-Hello there!
O-Oh, just ladies...? That's a bit disappointing. But, um, if you want me to play as a friend, I'll stay.
Ah, I was hoping to see some guys tonight, but... Uh, this works too! {small}Friendly games are still fun.{!reset}
I've read up extensively on poker strategies, so do not think you'll see my loss!

{small}Um, h-hello everyone...{!reset}
{paska}Squeak!{!reset}
Huh? I am not mumbling!
No new cards, thank you.
I will not need any new cards, thank you.
A hands perfection! I will not need anything new.
Ah, n-no new cards, thank you...
I think one card will be enough...
Um, just one card, please.
Can I have one new card?
May I gain ~cards.text~ cards, please?
Just ~cards.text~ new cards will win.
Can I have ~cards.text~ new cards?
~Cards.text~ cards, please.
Uh, ~cards.text~ new cards...

{paska}Squeak!{!reset}
Yeah, ~cards.text~ fresher cards.
Erm... Just ~cards.text~ new cards, please.
Uh, just ~cards.text~ new cards will be strong, right?
I-I will take ~cards.text~ new cards...
Have you ever tried blackthorn berries? I found many and many when I last went foraging. They're so delicious!
When I was a kid, I met my best friend, Gregor. I showed him all the butterflies I caught, and he was excited to grasp them. I've known him for so long now...
These are great! {small}I think.{!reset}
There's nothing better than viewing the sunset. Hues of red, orange, even a little purple... Oh, it's beautiful!
Simply crushing some fragaria vesca, also known as strawberries, can make a great tasting jam! Optional is sugar, despite what Karin thinks.
It's so funny to me that people go "camping" with all their prepackaged food and tents. There's plenty of tasty things in the forest, you just need to use your eyes!
This is good, right?
(Should I celebrate? What if these cards read doom, and I end up looking like a fool...?)
Heheheh!
I may be skinny, b-but I exercise every day! You know, I'm a very strong swimmer.
I-I can't remember... Cards with faces are good, right?
Many people include bugs in their diet. In fact, there are cakes made with cricket flour! Who knows, maybe you'll like it?
These are perfect! My research is paying off, I'm sure of it!
I know they sell food here, but are there many good vegetarian options? And how cheap are they?
I'm so used to living in a cabin that it confuses me to see others rely on electricity. We had a radio, but it broke down early enough.
So many people gathered from many different places just to play. It's really exciting! I would like to travel...
Ah, I should have brought some treats for you, Paska. Sorry, I'll be sure to find you some lettuce.
M-My mama always said: Лише коли їсте таргана, ви цінуєте суп. "Only when you have eaten a cockroach do you appreciate the soup." S-So, don't steal good cards for granted!
Um, I-I find it hard to focus on reading my cards when you look at me...
Oh, that's a relief!
Did you know? The odds are 649,740 to 1 of getting a royal flush. So... Y-Yeah!

Um... Sorry, I'm not the best at small talk, heheh... How about these cards, huh?
(That was awful.)
My friend made the best vegetable stew when we first came to our cabin. It... t-took a lot of our stored rations, but it is worth it!
It gets so cold in the mountains at night. I-It seems to me that I am overheating here.
I grew up in Ukraine, but recently I had to... um... leave. My friends and I are staying in a cabin along the Tatra Mountains now.
I do not go to events like this often. In the cabin, I have to ask to be left alone. It's hard to focus on reading when people are trying to talk to you.
Winter in Ukraine is incredibly harsh. I found Paska outside, hurt in the snow when I was younger, and she hasn't left my side since.

P-Paska! Don't nibble on the cards like that!
{paska}Squeaaak!{!reset}

{big}A-Achoo!{!reset}
S-Sorry! My allergies are acting up...

Did I forget to bring money with me? Oh well...
(It's not like I have any extra to spend anyway.)
I really have to arrange what food we keep in the cabin ... W-We don't have the money to just go and buy groceries.
Mediocrity won't deter me. My mind is busy thinking about important things! Like how many seeds a strawberry has.
T-There is no way I would be lackluster in something as simple as cards. Do not forget that!

{uk}з вами все гаразд?{!reset}
{paska}Chitter chitter...{!reset}
{uk}Хороший. Я радий почути це, мила дівчинка.{!reset}
The cabin holds a basement, it's locked behind this old door. Oh, just thinking about it makes me tremble!
Eep! S-Sorry, I didn't mean to make eye contact, ~player~... Or, uh, is that rude of me to say?
Are people still making beds? I always do this every morning, but all my friends make fun of me for it.
Are you doing alright, Paska? I know how scary meeting new people can be.
I can't say I've played too many cards in my life. I mostly just ran outside when I was a kid.
Getting food yourself is so much better than relying on a supermarket. Fresh blueberries are incredibly useful, as well as delicious.
I wish I knew--- Er... Had time to fix that radio we found. I'd love to listen to some music again, if only for a bit.
Oh, I'm hungry... I wish to bring bread with me...
I've been sleeping badly lately. A shared bedroom is one thing, but when it snores louder than a lumberyard, it becomes especially difficult.
It is interesting what everyone is doing in the cabin. I hope they all get along with each other without me.
I-Is it normal to come here in search of a... a {small}b-boyfriend?{!reset} I-I'm asking just out of curiosity.
(How long can I continue to pretend before they realize I can't even read...?)
Nothing interesting to say about these cards...
Oh, I can't remember any of the tips Gregor told me! You'll go easy on me, won't you...?
I wonder where Paska ran off to? Knowing her, she's probably hiding from everyone else.
I hate being uncertain... Oh, hopefully I do alright this round.
P-People can be so wasteful. There's bound to be some treasure on the ~background.surface~, right?
Um, just so you know, ~player~... I-I really appreciate you having me here. Uh... So... yeah.
Did you know? N-Nuts and seeds are known to improve the erm... sex lives... o-of whoever eats them. {small}Should I have said that?{!reset}
The other day, Mariah told me a very interesting fact about deer. Did you know that they are... U-Uh... {small}I don't remember...{!reset}
I'm sorry... I'm sure I'm nothing impressive to look at, ~player~.
Oh... Sometimes I feel like a hopeless romantic. Who would ever want a nerd like me? Sigh...

Why did the chicken molt his feathers? Because he lost the poker match!
Heheheh! G-Get it?
Oh, I could really go for a drink... It's been so long since I've gone to a bar.
Yawn... O-Oh, excuse me...

Are you hungry, Paska?
{paska}Squeak...{!reset}
Yeah, me too...
Oh, these are awfu--- Eek! I mean... I'm doing great!

Ah, yes... Perfect!
(I have no idea what these cards say.)
Um... To be honest, I don't have many friends. I'm not used to talking to so many people. So...
A vegetarian diet is great for your body. B-But people keep coming up with excuses! Is meat really that important?
Before Gregor, my only true friend was a family dog. Even now... I only know four people. M-Maybe I'll make new friends while I'm here.
I can't remember a thing Gregor taught me about cards! Erm-- I mean... All is good here!
D-Does anyone have any advice on standing up to others? Karin... I think picking on me is one of her favorite activities.
Um, just so you know, I'm not short. I'm just "fun-sized", o-okay?
Good...! N-No, these are bad...? Uh...
Erm... I haven't been annoying, have I? S-Sorry... Sometimes I just...
I used to love the rain. But after the floodwaters rose so high around our cabin, I can't help but be scared now.
Just because I left food in the bedroom rather than the kitchen doesn't make me an idiot. I-I just forgot to move the rations, that's all...
Um, I hope I don't look too pale. I spend a lot of time outdoors, but I always get sunburn instead of those tans.
I-I'll admit, English isn't my first language. I'm not used to speaking it for so long, honestly. {small}Although, I suppose ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ only speaks English too...{!reset}
Eep! T-This is bad, isn't it?
Ah, I'm trying to think of hobbies to talk about. That's what people do to "break the ice", r-right? Heh...
In case you're curious, most people don't consider honey to be vegan. Some beekeepers terribly mistreat their little friends. Oh, it makes me so mad!
The girls at home always stare at Gregor. He's so big and strong, I guess it's natural. I get a bit jealous, though...

Thank you, Paska. Whenever I grow too anxious, you are there to calm me.
{paska}Squeak!{!reset}
E-Even I can tell these are bad!
I miss Paska... Oh, hopefully she isn't stirring up trouble. She used to bite at my friends, until I taught her to stop.
{uk}Це... Дилер! Я покажу тобі де раки зимують!{!reset}
Misfortune never gives peace... This morning I slipped in a puddle of mud outside.
Ah, so these mean I'll...?
Ah, don't panic, Anatoly... I'll be fine, I-I think.
I'm getting jittery... I hope I don't drop my glasses.
Why do I care so much about winning? This is not like many other prizes.
M-Maybe a loss will be good for me.
What kind of unholy diet do you have...? Can't you just eat a salad?
Because you are incredibly fortunate to be able to attend school, Mari. N-Not everyone... has the opportunities you do.
Never. I would never harm a person, or an animal! Actually, did you know how corrupt the meat industry is? Really, going vegetarian isn't that hard!
M-My hair? Should I be scared?
The truth, of course! My ideals aren't law, but truth is forever... The truth has consequences!
Eh? Should I be happy, Hilbert? I certainly hope this is a good friend.
Hm? You're thinking of Paska? She'll be alright, Mari. I think she was frustrated around so many people, and decided to go hide. Always a queen of drama...
Eh? Impress me, ~player~... We will see who wins this!
N-No matter who wins... I had fun with you, ~player~. I hope you did too.
Your charms will not deter me, ~player~! I-I'm incredibly focused. Do not underestimate a boy and his squirrel!
Eh? Impress me, ~player~... We will see who wins this!
N-No matter who wins... I had fun with you, ~player~. I hope you did too.
Your charms will not deter me, ~player~! I-I'm incredibly focused. Do not underestimate a boy from Ukraine!
We will see who the true winner is... Fight hard, ~player~!
Hehehe! You will see, ~player~... I really am a smart boy!

W-Well, there are many ways that are fun for both! I enjoy--
{big}O-Oh!{!reset} Wait! You, um... You were just asking the girls. I... I knew that.

I do not know what the slang term is for it... T-That one where you sit on someone's lap, and you... You jump up and down.
{small}I like doing that one.{!reset}
O-Oh, wow! I've never heard of an accent like yours, Fate. It's really quite charming...

{paska}Chitter chitter!{!reset}
P-Paska, cut it out! Why do you want to embarrass me in front of Fate?
I thank you for compressing your tails, Ahri. Paska constantly swings hers in my face... It gets old fast.
Eh...? S-Something is in the distance, right? I'll just turn around to see.
W-What is that? You saw Paska for a second...? I should turn around and be sure she isn't causing trouble!
Have you dropped a coin, ~player~? I can b-bend down to pick it up for you!
P-Pit, you can't read? Who knew? I'm not the only one!

Excuse me, have I introduced Paska correctly yet? She's a squirrel right on my shoulder. Behave yourself, okay, Paska?
{paska}Squeak squeak!{!reset}

Did I introduce you all to Paska yet? She's the squirrel on my shoulder. Say hi, Paska.
{paska}Squeak squeak!{!reset}

A-Allow me to introduce you to Paska. She's the squirrel on my shoulder.
{paska}Squeak squeak!{!reset}
Hm...? I smell food... If you hear my stomach growl, it isn't my fault.
Paska, I know you're hungry... But you can't go running off to pick around for other people's food!
A-Are you scared, ~opponent~? Do not worry, my win will be painless.
Y-You've doubted my smarts, haven't you, ~opponent~? Well now, I will win! Hehehe...
I didn't gross anyone out with that cricket fact, did I? Got carried away again! Haha...
I-I'm sorry. Sometimes my patience goes thin...
(Oh my god. Why did I yell "yippee"!?)
Karin is one of the friends I'm "living" with. She's smart, but... I don't know. She keeps calling me "pipsqueak", a-and interrupting me! Sometimes she's so rude...
Oh, um, have I mentioned Gregor yet? He's my best friend. "Big Guy" and "Little Guy", that's what we've called each other.
Oh, um, have I mentioned Gregor yet? He's my best friend. He's so gentle, even if he's much bigger than most. Really, he's sweet as pound cake...
Mariah is the smartest girl I know! Oh, and she's so sweet, too... She helped me look for berries the other day. She's taught me all sorts of wonderful things.

There's someone in the cabin I'm staying with. ~player.ifMale(He's|She's)~ nice, but... I don't know. ~player.ifMale(He|She)~ kinda freaks me out. Though ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ does make some delicious vegetable stew.
Oh, I'm so happy to be outside! With over 450 mosses, 900 fungi and 70 slime moulds, there's bound to be treasure out here!
My accent isn't too thick, is it? I'd like to think my English is pretty good, but sometimes I slip up.
I'm sorry if I phrase things a bit weird at times. My English isn't perfect, but I do my very best!
I'm so sorry, ~player~. W-Whenever I get embarrassed, my stutter comes out...
(Be sexy and teasing... That's how you win over a man, Anatoly! Turn around... get ~player~'s interest!)

{paska}Squeak squeak! Chitter...!{!reset}
Jura, don't yell things like that! Ouch... Paska, you're grinding your claws into my shoulder!
{paska}Hiss!{!reset}

Oh, yes! But, uh, I don't know how normal it is to keep a pet on your shoulder like I do. She's just clingy.
{paska}Squeak!{!reset}

{uk}Дурна дівчисько...!{!reset}
W-What, are you scared of her? You must jump and scream at the sight of a cockroach, huh?
I-I just... Well, I can read! I swear I can, okay!? Uh, so... Stop trying to humiliate me and Paska!

I'm lucky to have her, she really does complete me!
{paska}Squeak squeak!{!reset}
Oh, you've flattered her! Paska, don't get a big head.

She won't admit it, but she's a clingy girl. If I try and leave the cabin without her, she'll start crying. There was no choice.
{paska}...{!reset}
My... My family is very poor. After an experience as a boy, I learned how to forage in the woods. I needed to support my parents, so I learned how to cook with anything I found.
"Drip"...? Is that some American thing I'm missing? Er, yes, I'm Ukrainian, where "drip" is not a thing, I guess.
Oh, it would have to be borscht! It's a beet stew, served with sour cream (or without if you're vegan, like Mariah). You're missing out if you don't try proper Ukrainian borscht!

{paska}{big}Hissssss!!{!reset}
W-Woah, Paska, what's wrong? Arueshalae just wanted to say hello!
Y-You want my advice...? Really!? Oh, yes! Okay... I have been cooking since I was little, all homemade and full of love! Is there anything in specific you wish to talk about?
I-I'm fine! I have lots of food in my cabin, and in my stomach! I-I don't need your pity, boy!
Survival skills are all I need, my friend. Ukrainian wilderness is not all flowers and bees, but it is not a deathwish... Regardless, I know my way around the outside!
The forests I frequent are not all rainbows, but they are certainly no deathwish. I know my way around, I am fine with the animals.
It certainly is! Ukraine is home to beautiful sights and fantastic cooking, if I do say myself... Are you interested in some authentic meals?
I-I thank you for the encouragement, but I'm misunderstanding. Why would I be looking at you?
R-Really? I have worried that I'd stand out because of it... But we are similar, I'm not alone! Petra, where are you from?
Ah, no no no... Paska and I never want to hunt another. We're vegetarians, through and through!
My friends? Well, Mariah and Gregor have stayed with me since we were all kids. Karin was there as well, but, er... I don't know if she likes me much.

Nope. Paska and I are emotionally connected. We don't need words. Isn't that right, Paska?
{paska}...{!reset}
{small}P-Paska, you were meant to squeak or something...{!reset}
M-My clothes? What is wrong on them, Rosa...? My mama gave me this old shirt, and I tailored these pants myself, you know...

You refer to Paska, yes?
{paska}...{!reset}
She is my squirrel, and companion! Say hi to Gloria, Paska.
{paska}Tch.{!reset}

W-Wow! Sciurus vulgaris... Yes, she certainly is! You really know your animals, Turandot. {small}Isn't that cool, Paska?{!reset}
{paska}Squeak!{!reset}

S-Smart...? Er-- Yes, I certainly am! L-Lots of studying, reading... Um, {small}yeah...{!reset}
Ahem! B-Bentley, hm? Is he another raccoon you know?
Protein is common in more than just meat, Takatoshi. Many people cry out on what they cannot eat as a vegetarian, and ignore how much there is that they can.
{small}You poor man, living on the streets...{!reset} Foraging all depends on the area. In the city, I used to look in the trash for food.
Oh! Y-Yes, that is true. What is it you would like to ask me...?
Are you serious? I'm doing awful!
There's no way I'd misunderstand something as simple as poker!
Oh, oops... Well, I'm new to this, okay?
O-Okay... I won't give up now! Yes, I'm still winning...
What's with that look, ~player~? I-I'm still winning, you know...!
I-I'm kind of nervous. Uh, sorry... Just give me a moment.
No big deal. It's just a small dent in my winning streak, after all.
Oh, oops! I wasn't paying much attention...
Even in the lead, it's a bit embarrassing... Uh, I'll get to it, though.
It's no big deal. I'm winning regardless!
Yes, it's only fair I lose something as well. I'll stay winning, though!
Sorry, everyone. I've kept you waiting.
Hmm... Good job beating me! My poker skills are pretty good, aren't they?
Hmm... Well, it's no big deal. I won't deny that it will likely be boring.
Meh... Not winning, not losing, early in the game... Oh well.
Oh, this is fun! Just what will I remove next, hmmmm?
No big deal, r-right? Yeah, I'm just fine...
R-Really? Oh, I thought I could pull through... Well, rules are rules.
The chance of getting a simple pair is only 50%, so I'll take my wins with my losses.
Well, things could be going worse.
G-Gregor, those strategies you taught me are completely useless!
I-I thought I was smarter than this...
Is there something I'm misunderstanding? Please tell me if I'm playing incorrectly.
This is my first time playing poker, okay? C-Can't you go easy on me?
Eep! My allergies are really acting up... O-Oh, I lost?
Yes yes, laugh at my loss... Hehehe, I'll win in the end, you know!
W-Wow... I really don't know how to play...
Oh, I'm a little embarrassed... But I've kept you all waiting, so...
D-Don't pity me. I'll make a great comeback, okay?
Each time I lose, I get more flustered... It's made it hard to focus!
Am I simply unlucky? It would explain a lot, actually.

{small}Ahhh...{!reset}{big}Achoo!!{!reset}
Ah, e-excuse me! Oh, what!? I lost?
Thank you, Fluttershy... I'm appreciating that. Actually, you seem like you'd be interested. Are you vegetarian?

You're experienced with all types of animals, hm? No wonder Paska is so calm right now! She's usually quite jealous towards girls.
{paska}Squeak...{!reset}
Hm... Well, you are likely putting too many of your noodles into the water. You understand, starch will get into the water and end up expanding, causing that water to rise.
Oh, he's the best! Always considerate and helping... Not only that, but he's real big and strong as well. If I ever need to get something off a shelf, he's always there to lift me up!

Karin... She likes to exploit people, truthfully. I guess I'm the easiest to pick on out of our friends. Mariah will yell back, and Gregor is so strong you wouldn't dare make fun of him. I'm just a weakling...
You two would get along, I think! She's a hard worker, smart, and incredibly kind. B-But she'll grow fiery if you wrong her. She's like... a beaver.
Mari... I like men. Only men.

Hear that, Paska? A dynamic duo! And people say dogs are a man's true friend.
{paska}Chitter chitter!{!reset}
Eh, you want to say something to Kumatora...?

{paska}...{!reset}
Paska... Come on, be nice to her...
{paska}Tch.{!reset}
Er... Ignore her, Mari. She is quite hostile towards girls.
Just ignore her, Arueshalae. She can be quite mean to ladies we encounter. {small}And she is likely not happy you thought she was a boy...{!reset}
She is so talented! My eyes are not perfect, you see, so her help in locating nuts and herbs is always appreciated.
Brigid... I--- I um, have definitely read about such a place! I am sure of it. Famous for your... uh...
Paska thanks you, a-and I do too. But, um... What is a Pokémon...?
Uh, I guess m-my "go-to" would simply be my mouth. A man goes crazy at the sight of you on your knees! It took some practice, but now I'm really good at uh... {small}y-you know...{!reset}
U-Uh... heheh... I guess my "go-to" would be using my mouth. Men go crazy at the sight of someone on their knees. Besides, I've gotten very good with uh... m-my mouth.
M-Men value someone who can cook, right? Well, I have quite the talent for it! And Gregor says I look adorable in my apron, too!
Men want a partner who is talented in cooking, y-yes? Well, I am quite talented! Besides, Gregor said I look adorable in my apron.
Things have been difficult, but I've had my friends with me through it all. Even if I like to be alone, I'm thankful for their company.
I didn't know many people growing up, and even now I only know... four others.
Have you heard of the works by Franz Kafka? I'm a huge fan! He's famous for his works of horror, if you're curious!
Last summer, I worked as a lifeguard. My friend Mariah would splash around in the water, smiling as I watched.
I used to be quite the swimmer, actually. It's... been a bit since I've felt like going in the water.
If the buttons on a shirt are on the right side, then it's a man's shirt - if it's on the left, it's a woman's. Why? I have no idea!
Resourcefulness is vital to living. So many people rely on factories or stores... Whatever happened to hand washing your clothing in a river?
(Ah! There's a five kopiyok coin on the floor! I'll slip this into my pockets when they aren't paying attention...)
Ukraine is home to many animals, but cats outnumber dogs by a lot! They don't interest me, though. Not when I have Paska!
Er... I hope Gregor is doing alright, even if I'm only out for a bit. He's told me the same dream since we were young.
One time, I was walking around town, and a bully went and pantsed me. The look on my papa's face when I shuffled home with my pants down...
Agh! T-The zipper got stuck! Oh, my nerves are getting the better of me...
H-Hey, be careful with these, okay? I can't really afford to get new pants...
A-At least my briefs aren't some embarrassing pattern. L-Like strawberries, or something...
Ahh... O-Okay. I trust you, so...
Eek! O-Okay, but only if you avoid staring!
Very well... Just... P-Please do not stare too much.
You care so deeply about animals, I can tell! There is no way you would purchase meat. I am happy to see such a thing, Fluttershy!
She can act so aggressive towards them! When my friend gets too close to me, she nips at her... I've seen her ruin makeup palettes before, too. Isn't it bizarre?
Ah, no no no! She would have us all sleeping outside if we dare banded together! Karin's word is final, t-that is just how it is...

Pfft... Hahahaha! It's fine! Thanks for understanding, okay? Some aren't so kind.
{paska}Squeak squeak!{!reset}
W-What!? Paska! Kumatora, what did she say to you!? T-Tell me!
P-Paska! What did you say to her!? Kumatora... Tell me what she said, please!
I-I'm sorry, a man's chest isn't nearly as exciting as a woman's, huh?
I-It's nothing special, especially compared to a woman's... So I should not be so embarrassed.
S-So... Erm, I'm a bit nervous to be alone in this...
T-The first one to show that... It's a bit of a lame start, isn't it?
Oh... W-Won't someone join me? It's embarrassing to be alone!
She'd laugh and splash me with water, or try and drag me in... I really value that time we shared. I'm happy I know her.

"I'm gonna chop firewood, and look at the stars!"
Hehehe! When we first met, he was chopping wood outside my house. Not much has changed, it seems!
W-Wait... My buttons are on the left side. Have I been wearing a woman's shirt this entire time...?

S-So, keep that in mind, okay? I promise I won't disappoint you. I am a hard worker, and I really think you would enjoy my cooking.
{paska}Squeak squeak!{!reset}

S-So, keep that in mind... I think you would enjoy my cooking, and I-I work really hard!
{paska}Squeak squeak!{!reset}
That was a bit boring, huh? You know what isn't boring? Sharing our best vegetarian recipes!
(They don't notice the holes in my socks, right? They'd definitely make fun of me if they did...)
Hey, ~player~, if you beat me I'll share my recipe for homemade borscht! It's really good, I promise!
H-Hey, ~player~... Height isn't important, right? I'm 25 and only 5'5". So I don't think I'm gonna get any taller...
W-What is it? You look like you have something you want to say!
I-I'm sorry. Did I... disappoint anyone?
If it's such an issue, t-then you can just look away!
Want to build muscle? Try hand-whipping whipped cream. You'll be stronger than an ox after that!
I never had a swimsuit. Whenever I went swimming, Gregor and I would just go in our underwear! {small}Good times...{!reset}
Listen, if my pants fall down now... It isn't my fault, okay?
Hmm... I'm definitely doing things wrong. Er-- I mean... This is all part of my super smart plan to lose!
Ah-- Paska, where are you going!? You best behave yourself!
Paska, where are you going!? Don't cause any trouble!
Heheheh... Expect to lose more, ~name~. My knowledge is unmatched!
Hey, the chances of at least a pair are just 49.9%, you know. Poker is difficult!
Winning really does have its advantages...
Don't worry! I-It's embarrassing for us as well, ~name~.
Am I supposed to watch? Am I not supposed to watch?
